summary: Diff implements the requested Roblox-style sidebar navigation, adds Inventory/Groups/Settings routes/pages, enhances Discover with category tabs and Trending by category, extends the backend Experience model with category/stats/controls (plus a migration), updates publishing flow to require category and allow controls text, and adds rating controls + in-play UI elements (controls guidance + in-game menu). Some backend/frontend behaviors are only partially verifiable due to truncation of key files (backend/main.mo, ExperienceDetails.tsx, PublishExperienceDialog.tsx, useExperiences.ts).
